summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nexus AI Desktop Automation app. Backend APIs fully functional with AI integration working. Frontend loads correctly with shadcn design, theme toggle, agent controls, and chat functionality all working properly.

minor_bugs.issue: Root endpoint missing 'version' field in response

ui_bugs.issue: Clear session may not properly restore initial welcome message

passed_tests: Backend desktop action APIs (move, click, type)
Backend AI analysis with Claude integration
Frontend page loading with shadcn design
Agent start/stop toggle with status updates
Chat message sending and AI responses
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fixes: Add version field to root endpoint response and ensure clear session properly restores initial message
